column4: Manikpur - Bashbari Part 2 | Erosion of around 1300 mtr. had occurred w.e..f 17/06/2022 to 30/06/2022. One (1) Nos of Relief camp opened due to the said erosion (1) Tilpukhuri ME Madrasa ,Male=45 Female=50 Child=30 Pregnant=0 Disability=0Total=125(Latitude-26.39971 Longitude-90.753438) since 17.06.2022 to till date 01.07.2022/Total Inmates-125. Medical Team- 2 Nos. date- 31.08.2022, Total Population-310. erosion continues to Bashbari par 2. on 31.08.2022. | 0

Chabua - Gereki & Gereki Nepali | Bank damage has engulfed around 500m of reach as per information received from WRD on 29/8/2022. GPS coordinates for the area is from 27 34'13.03"N/95 14'58.23E to 27 34'10.3"N/95 14'40.3" | 0
Barbhag - Karia | B/Dyke on R/B of River Pagladia from Bijulighat to Adabari Length 300 Mtr,, as per report submitted by Asstt. Executive Engineer Mukalmua W.R. Sub Division on 30/08/2022 | 100000

Tamulpur - Vill- Chapatal | As report ricieved on dated 31-08-2022, that erosion takes place on chapatal kalajhar shupa near by pagoldia river. (Longit-91.540687, lati-26.555096). As report ricieved on dated 31-08-2022, Due to the same erosion the kalajhar Chupa Mazid got damaged. ( Longi-91.506343, Lati-26.579276). | 0

Margherita - 1. T/ Dyke from Chippibasti to Moulang gaon | Severe bank erosion from Chainage 1700 m to 2100m on the left bank of Tirap river at T/ Dyke from Chippibasti to Moulang gaon embankment since 01/08/2022 till 31/08/2022. As per information received from WR department officials, the affected stretch is about 400 m in length | 0,  Doomdooma - 1. Saikhowa Protection Bund Ph-I at Chumoni(Spur no. 5 and 6), 2.
